headline: Black Friday Is More Important for Stock Markets Than Ever. This Is Why and 4 Other Things to Know Today.
summary: Futures trading halted by data center outage, crypto firm tied to Trump family dismisses top executives, more news to start your day.

headline: Does Bank of America's (BAC) Wildfire Relief Program Reveal a New Era of Customer-Driven Innovation?
summary: In November 2025, Bank of America launched a comprehensive support initiative for mortgage clients affected by Los Angeles wildfires, including extended forbearance, a forthcoming Rebuild Line of Credit, and preservation of existing mortgage rates. This response highlights the bank's ability to adapt its offerings to meet client needs during crises and reflects broader customer-focused innovation efforts. We will examine how Bank of America’s latest mortgage support program could reinforce...

headline: Bank of America: Best Quarter In Years - And It's Still The Cheapest Mega-Bank
summary: Bank of America posts strong Q3 growth, higher income, solid IB and trading, low valuation, high dividend yield and 2026 upside. Learn why BAC stock is a buy.
